about_the_game:
Start a Startup is a visual novel, a multi-ending story where your choices matter.
Answer questions about startups and business terminology to advance the plot and unlock new chapters.


Guide:
In this game you advance the story through clicking.
There are multiple endings, and the outcomes change according to the choices you make.
You can find hints about the choices you will make throughout.
Packed with features: test your business knowledge with quizzes and fight off curses in a fun minigame!

Story:
A university student is possessed by the ghost of the legendary feudal lord Oda Nobunaga, who teaches him how to conquer the business world and learn the basics of starting a startup.

So, what is a startup?:
It's a type of business that dares to change the world with innovative new goods and services.

Recommended for:
- People who are interested in forming a startup but don't know where to start.
- People who love Japanese culture, history, and visual novels."

*Experience the first chapter out of seven in this demo of the game.
*Please note that your data from the demo will not be carried over to the final version.

fullgame.name: Start a Startup with a Legendary Japanese Warlord

name: Start a Startup with a Legendary Japanese Warlord Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A short visual novel with quizzes to help you dip your toes into the world of startups. The first (and let's be honest, probably last) game about startups in human history!
